com.github.bjarneh.utilz

Class path

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.bjarneh.utilz.path

  • public class path
extends Object
    Some common path utility functions. 
    
  // Typical use:

  String validPathOnYourOs;

  validPathOnYourOs = path.fromSlash("/some/file/name");
  validPathOnYourOs = path.join(new String[]{"some","dir","name"});

  // get a list of files under 'validPathOnYourOs'
  String[] files    = path.walk(validPathOnYourOs);
    note: There is a lot of comments here since this is meant to be a library with some documentation, i.e. make sure you turn on your comment folding before you start reading this file.
